changeSet.author: Lucas Lopatka
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ${POSTGRES_SCHEMA}.assignment ( assignment_id, title, work_section_code, location_id, courtroom_id, escort_run_id, effective_date, expiry_date, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) SELECT ( assignment_id, title, work_section_code, location_id, courtroom_id, escort_run_id, effective_date, expiry_date, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) FROM ${POSTGRES_SCHEMA}.temp_assignment

INSERT INTO ${POSTGRES_SCHEMA}.courtroom ( courtroom_id, courtroom_code, courtroom_name, location_id, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) SELECT ( courtroom_id, courtroom_cd, courtroom_name, location_id, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) FROM ${POSTGRES_SCHEMA}.temp_courtroom

INSERT INTO ${POSTGRES_SCHEMA}.court_role_code ( court_role_code, court_role_name, effective_date, expiry_date, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) SELECT ( court_role_code, description, effective_date, expiry_date, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) FROM ${POSTGRES_SCHEMA}.temp_court_role_code

INSERT INTO ${POSTGRES_SCHEMA}.jail_role_code ( jail_role_code, jail_role_name, effective_date, expiry_date, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) SELECT ( jail_role_code, description, effective_date, expiry_date, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) FROM ${POSTGRES_SCHEMA}.temp_jail_role_code

INSERT INTO ${POSTGRES_SCHEMA}.escort_run ( escort_run_id, title, location_id, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) SELECT ( escort_run_id, title, location_id, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) FROM ${POSTGRES_SCHEMA}.temp_escort_run

INSERT INTO ${POSTGRES_SCHEMA}.other_assign_code ( other_assign_code, other_assign_name, effective_date, expiry_date, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) SELECT ( other_assign_code, description, effective_date, expiry_date, created_by, updated_by, created_dtm, updated_dtm, revision_count ) FROM ${POSTGRES_SCHEMA}.temp_other_assign_code
